Pre-Game Insights: England have had a mixed campaign so far, with a loss against Ireland being the low point. However, they would go into the must-win clash against the Lankans high on confidence, having toppled New Zealand in their previous match.
Others: Sri Lanka might be eliminated from the semi-final race, but they will be no pushovers. The Asia Cup champions will be keen to sign off on a high and make life difficult for England.
